author: jonl
msg: Moved urlFor() convenience methods up to Component from Page.  This actually got rid of some silly code that said "page.urlFor(page, ...)" , which is redundant.  I thought about moving urlFor(PageMap, ...) into PageMap, but that seems to defeat the purpose which is to conveniently expose the urlFor() logic to components.  Having urlFor(PageMap, ...) in Component will make the choice obvious to programmers in their IDE as soon as they type urlFor.

author: ehillenius
msg: the original plan of checking ENABLED before calling listener interfaces was lost in the refactorings somehow. It's in there now.

author: jonl
msg: Added very basic sanity check for exception string conversion and removed TODO.
